column17:
Parfums Gres Cabochard Eau de Toilette - 50 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.3175

Elegant grand and an enduring classic Parfum Gres Cabochard is a floral fragrance from the design house of Gres. Introduced in 1959 this Eau De Toilette (EDT) was conceptualized by Madame Alix Gres herself and created by perfumer Bernard Chant. Drawing its inspiration from her visit to India this EDT imparts an aroma that is slightly exotic somewhat spicy and dominantly flowery reminding one of a sharp freshness of morning air and comfort of the sea breeze. Rich and vibrant yet exuding unexpected beguiling warmth with an intriguing enigma this floral fragrance is both subtle and alluring at once.

Recommended for evening wear Parfum Gres Cabochard can ignite passion and exuberance to those dull evenings. This Eau De Toilette opens with fruity and spicy accords of Tarragon Citrus Sage and Aldehydes intensifying with middle notes of Jasmine Ylang-Ylang Rose Orris and Geranium. Finally the fragrance warms into base accords of Amber Musk Coconut Moss Patchouli and Vetiver for a classic fragrance. Intoxicating and extremely feminine Parfum Gres Cabochard is a fragrance for the femme fatale in all of us.

Parfums Gres Fleur de Cabotine Eau de Toilette - 50 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.2200

Sensuously warm and divine Parfums Gres Fleur De Cabotine is a fragrance that lulls any woman that dons it into a velvety aura. A luxury scent especially made for the woman who yearns to embrace nature with all her heart. Created by Jean Claude-Delville and Jean Bethouart this eau de Toilette exudes an enchanting aroma.

Sweet-smelling mignonette fragrant syringa and zesty orange all come together in an aromatic union to make up the top note. The heart note is dominated with a lush floral tone that contains light essence of lily lovely orchid peony extracts that are reminiscent of spring with hints of cactus that add a unique edge to the scent. Finally the base note finishes off with a soothing and heavy musk sweet hints of heliotrope and a peachy aroma of nectarine. A mesmerising scent that combines the earthiness of woody extracts and light fragrance of floral ingredients makes this an ideal scent for any occasion. The bottle that hold this fragrance features an interesting shape with a slender neck rounded base and a crown in the shape of a flower. The glass bottle radiates shades of yellow merging into green - a testament to the lush ingredients that comes from nature. This delightful scent makes its presence felt with a charismatic aura that surrounds you with a mere whiff.

column17:
Parfums Gres Cabotine Eau de Toilette - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.3325

Youthful fanciful theatrical - the Cabotine woman pouts and flutters her flirty lids at you. Just a glance from her and the senses swoon for just a smile men fall at her feet. Cabotine from Parfum Gres is more than just an essence - it's the aura of your essential femininity. Created by perfumer Jean-Claude Delville Cabotine entices with its sensuality.

Inspired by the exotic ginger lily that blooms only for a few days and wilts within hours Cabotine is a metaphor for the transformation of an adolescent girl into a woman and the fresh bloom of youthful sensuality. This Eau de Toilette features a top note of blackcurrant buds plums pears and fresh coriander. The floral heart of rose tuberose ylang-ylang ginger lily hyacinth freesia violet and iris trails into the intoxicating warmth of cedar wood creamy vanilla tonka beans velvety musk and amber accords in the base note. Artistically crafted Cabotine embodies the young at heart the vibrant the vivid and the utterly contemporary.
